review: Woo hoo. I can't believe I missed out on streaming for this long. SInce its my first time with this I decided to try out the stick vs the tv. The stick is definetly the right choice for me. I hate using voice controls (awkward talking to an inanimate object) so I do not need this function. Setting up was literally just pluggin in the little stick. I already have youtube and hulu accounts so I just simply logged myself in and started watching tv. The wait time for each load is not particularly long. I have an older computer for watching videos so the load time is just slightly same or less.
author: Bunny

review: Love it, makes using the internet on TV so easy
author: Rachel Senyitko

review: I was very pleased. I found it extremely easy to set up. It's a must for a Prime customer. You can easily watch your Prime shows or listen to your Prime music through your tv.  I found the Fire Stick apps much simpler to use than the apps on my Blueray or tv. The interface is smoother and simpler to navigate.I would have given 5 stars but I feel that the claim that you have all these shows and movies, is a bit misleading since you do have to be a subscriber to most of these companies that the apps represent, in order to watch the tv shows and movies.Please consider changing the wording. Also, the way some tvs are set up, it would be better to have the power cord, connect to the bottom of the stick instead of on the side.Overall, I loved this and would recommend it to my friends and family.
author: Paula H

review: So much better than our Chromecast because the remote is very easy to use, and having Amazon and Netflix available on the same device is great.  My 7 year old is also quite adept at using it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Price is right and it is easy to hookup, but statement: "Fire TV Stick connects to your TV's HDMI port. It's an easy way to enjoy over 250,000 TV episodes and movies on Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, HBO GO, and Hulu Plus, plus games, music, and more" - is not finished. Should sadd: "if you pay 3 to 10 times more than renting at other rental outlets (like Safeway). There is no single movie you can watch for free, always have to either register for monthly payment to Netflix, HBO, Hulu etc.or pay for individual movies. I'm totally disappointed.
author: Andrzej K.

review: Awesome product!!!! Works great. Definitely would recommend!!
author: Melissa Judd

review: This was easy to set up so we can enjoy watching movies anywhere. I even took the fire stick on vacation and easily hooked it up to the TV there.
author: Always Mommy

review: It does everything I needed it to do! Access to Prime, Netflix, and Hulu are easy. Just plug it into the tv and go. I do keep the stick plugged into the wall for power as I watch. I've had a couple times where it will pause for a moment, but that may just be my internet.
author: Tetra

review: I use this in my RV.  It works great wherever we have a wireless internet connection.  Happy I gave it a shot during Amazon's July black-Friday thing (even if most of the deals were lame...this deal worked out!)  If you don't have a smart TV with integrated Netflix or Amazon Prime or a host of other aps....this will work for you.  I haven't seen the Google or Apple products...so can't compare.  But for $25, I'm a happy camper.  *Get it?  I use it in my RV...happy camper.  Get it?Not five stars because the MLB ap doesn't work very good...if Amazon can get MLB to fix that ap, I'd be an ecstatic camper.
author: Nate Flint

review: Have 2 plus a full blow fire.  Can't beat it. Just needs to add HBO NOW support. -1 star for that.
